structure.unit: DIVISION 3. SPECIAL OFF-DUTY POLICE AND FIRE SERVICES

text.section:
Sec. 2-56.5. Same—Relinquishing.
A permittee may relinquish his permit at any time; provided, however, that in the event of such relinquishment, the permittee shall be required to pay to the Department which issued the permit a reasonable compensation for all expenses incurred and preparations made to provide the services authorized by said permit. The amount of said reasonable compensation may be agreed upon by the Department and the permittee at the time the permit is relinquished.
